divs: sighting detailsstepped outside to smoke and looked up. saw a dark circular\ovoid\spherical-type object headed north of me, emerging from behind debs park (highland park area). small, unresolvable (did not appear to be a lone balloon) climbing slowly and steadily, course east \ north-east. speed constant - was in view for approx. 5 minutes or so. it was moving against the wind. no helicopter \ jet \ airplane noise at all. there were no visible lights on the object. it did not perform any anomalous manoeuvres.
trends: There has been one other sighting in South Pasadena
There were no other sightings in South Pasadena on or around April 3rd 2006
Summary: Dark, circular unidentified object sighted headed east / north-east of my position.
